de.lessvoid.textureatlas

Class CoreTextureAtlasGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.textureatlas.CoreTextureAtlasGenerator

  • public class CoreTextureAtlasGenerator
extends Object
    This uses de.lessvoid.textureatlas.TextureAtlasGenerator while rendering individual CoreTextures into a CoreRenderToTexture target.
    Author:
    void

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoreTextureAtlasGenerator(CoreGL gl, int width, int height)
      Prepare a RenderToTexture target of the given width x height that will be used as the rendering target for the texture atlas algorithm.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextureAtlasGenerator.Result addImage(CoreTexture2D texture, String name, int padding)
      Add a single CoreTexture2D to the atlas and return informations about the position in the texture atlas.
      int getHeight()
      Height of the texture atlas used.
      CoreTexture2D getTargetTexture()
      The target texture allocated for the texture atlas.
      int getWidth()
      Width of the texture atlas used.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoreTextureAtlasGenerator

        public CoreTextureAtlasGenerator(CoreGL gl,
                                 int width,
                                 int height)
        Prepare a RenderToTexture target of the given width x height that will be used as the rendering target for the texture atlas algorithm.
        Parameters:
        width - width of the texture
        height - height of the texture

    • Method Detail

      • addImage

        public TextureAtlasGenerator.Result addImage(CoreTexture2D texture,
                                             String name,
                                             int padding)
        Add a single CoreTexture2D to the atlas and return informations about the position in the texture atlas.
        Parameters:
        texture - the texture
        name - the name used to identify this texture
        padding - padding value around the texture when being placed into the atlas
        Returns:
        the Result

      • getTargetTexture

        public CoreTexture2D getTargetTexture()
        The target texture allocated for the texture atlas. If you want to later render using the texture atlas you'll need to call this and call bind() on it.
        Returns:
        the CoreRenderToTexture allocated for the texture altas

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Width of the texture atlas used.
        Returns:
        width of the texture atlas

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Height of the texture atlas used.
        Returns:
        height of the texture atlas
